content:
Prev: Lindsay Up: Hot Shots vs Fire on the Field Next: Jennifer catches for Jennifer

Chalk time



The game was already about fifteen minutes delayed by the late arrival of the ump, so to avoid more delays we started play without baselines. But the chalk finally arrived and the chalker put on an impressive show of precision.
Taken Tuesday, May 04, 2004, 05:07:41pm.  Original image size: 1728x3072, 5.9Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/1250s @ F2.8, ISO 100, 70-200mm/F2.8 @ 105mm (168mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 0.25:10:50:50:0:25:7+M, Crop
